showerReviews.reviewText: I am a female passenger of a truck driver so showers being clean is a HUGE thing and this one was clean and huge and the water pressure is WOW! Definitely a great shower.

The 1 star is for the water pressure in the shower. So, came here to fuel and rest up. I had a flat and went by the shop. They said it would be 3-4 hours. No problem, I am staying the night anyway. 6 hours later, no call to come in. 3 guys ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stayed here several times while my x kept taking me to court for divorce.  They made it possible to tough it out financially during this struggle.  Shower facility was great, 5 star.  Enjoyed the TV room to relax while doing laundry.  Clo ‚Ä¶

Super quiet clean TA. Showered at 4 am no problems. Shower was amazing. Lady at the register was so nice and friendly.  Coffee was yummy. Will put on my list of places to park for the night when in the area.

‚Ä¶ and those cardboard stand up merchandisers. If you are desperate for a place to go to the bathroom, it is perfectly fine. The bathrooms are generally pretty clean. The showers are very nice, roomy and most have been recently redone. ‚Ä¶

Attention truckers...BEST shower I have come across in a long time. And that includes my own at home! Water pressure like its falling straight off the cliffs of Niagara Falls! Very clean and shower staff were fun and upbeat. Definitely ‚Ä¶
Way to go TA. Maybe you should use some of your reserved parking money to pay employees to clean your $15 showers. ‚Ä¶
15$ for a shower is ridiculous. Parking lot good other than the high cost shower it's not bad but these truck stops needs to stop ripping us off. We are not millionaires.

Worst truck stop I‚Äôve been to in a long time cashier was rude and after spending 15$ for a shower and buying 17$ worth of items from the store then I asked for a bag for my items she in returns says rudely it‚Äôs 10 cents for a bag. I laughed ‚Ä¶
Only has subway & popeyes.  Can't find a parking spot after 5 pm.  $15 for a shower if you don't have points or buy fuel.

showerReviews.reviewText: Small. Lots of food choices. Unlit bathroom stalls and sharps container give danger vibe.

This place is really perfect for anyone passing by and needing some rest. They completely renovated the place and it‚Äôs beautifully done with 3 of the best chains you could ask for: Burger King, Chik-fil-a, and Starbucks. Free wifi. Cleanest ‚Ä¶

First time ever here was arriving at 3 am. Clean bathroom with actual working automatic soap dispenser, water AND hand dryer üòÆ of course everything was closed as far as Chic-fila, Burger King and Starbucks so all that was left was the ‚Ä¶

No place to walk your dog. They replaced all grassy areas with big boulder like rocks.
Took 20 minutes to get 1 cup of coffee at Starbucks. Rate bitter. Bathroom filthy.

We visited Ardsley Plaza 3 times over the weekend and we could not be more satisfied. The location was convenient, facilities and dining areas were pristine, everything was orderly and well lit.  Staff at Starbucks were friendly, attentive ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ are many food options, and the interior of the travel center is extremely spacious and clean. The ceilings are super high so it really gives it a nice vibe when you're inside. Shower was clean, as was the bathroom. I'll definitely be back.

This place is nasty. I wouldn't touch or drink anything that doesn't come sealed in a bag or bottle. I paid my shower and got a used uncleaned room. I had no issue wiping the toilet down myself. In and out with minimal touching. So I ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ RESTROOMS ARE SO FILTHY, YOU'LL WANT TO HAVE A SHOWER AFTER YOU USE THEM ‚Ä¶
Very nice truck stop in Bloomfield CT areas.  Foods are great. 2 shower rooms available.  Staffs are very friendly.  I will definitely be back here regularly.  Thank you.  Brandon

‚Ä¶ especially for truck drivers., too many complaints of this location via all over the website and apps, they don‚Äôt immediately clean shower for next person to use, they only do ATM for laundry if you do not have ‚ÄúCash for Coins‚Äù., they ‚Ä¶

This place is a dump, 15 bucks for parking and 14 bucks for a shower and they don't do team showers so u end up paying 28 bucks....food is over priced and ppl working here don't take pride in appearances or in customer service, Way to take ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ he just stands there looking at me with a displeased face. I left a phone number for taking a shower, he said he would call within 40 minutes, 1.5 hours had passed, he still did not call. I have no desire to come here again. I have never ‚Ä¶

At this gas station at night I stopped to take a shower. Here the man said 30-40 minutes I will clean 20 minutes passed. Walks back and forth does not clean. The man does not do that. He is somehow shell-shocked. üëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèªüëéüèª ‚Ä¶
That‚Äôs how they give you the space of a shower. Thanks pide
bad service the shower is never available the employees have a bad attitude

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice miniature style Diesel truck stop. Very clean and great prices. Even bought a little heater for truck cause it's so cold.

Clean wow place is spotless. Looks like they even mop the lot so clean. Room for 6 trucks of drivers are experienced drivers. Inside looks like a building outside looks updated. Very friendly people working here and free coffee with fuel and all fuel cars expected here as well that's great for multi service card company drivers.
Nice clean truck stop friendly staff
There's about 8 to 10 parking spaces, but the single restroom is always clean and the employees are nice. I only wish they had showers

showerReviews.reviewText: On August 31st the bathrooms were closed for cleaning. The staff refused to open one of the shower rooms so people would be able to use the bathroom. Every TA in the country opens one or 2 of the shower rooms for people to use the bathroom. ‚Ä¶

It was ok for the most part Shower and rest rooms was clean. Didn't have to wait very long for shower. Also, I was able to park in a reserve spot. They wont allow you to double park & rest neither. Their Guys come out periodically and check ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ days. To park is $25. The showers are disgusting, hair plastered to the wall, along with toothpaste that has been splattered out of others' mouths. Toilet sorta looked wiped down on the seat, but that's it, needs a good cleaning. The shower ‚Ä¶

We have choices of truckstop's. I fuel mostly TA's & Petro. Spend over $500 in fuel and are given a shower credit. 25% of parking  lot is free. Rest is paid parking. Why can't we use a shower credit for parking? $500 spent you're given 100 ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I try to take shower but no free parking; just park beside the truck making easy access to everyone. The security guard came and shouted at me, we are here for your business

Associate tasha
I needed help from her for a shower coz
The didn‚Äôt work for me , she questioned me for a verification until she told me to bring my ID after bringing my ID she some how still refused to help purchase my shower

Ultra 1 points rarely work and when they do it requires you to get 60 gallons of fuel now to get a shower. Which is very difficult to do when the right side pump is not working and the clerk will not comp you a shower despite the broken ‚Ä¶

$25 per night to park in a lot that is filthy and smells terrible.  $18 for a shower that you need to wear shoes in so you don't catch something.  Very rude employees that act like doing their job is a huge inconvenience.  This place is low ‚Ä¶

Stopped to get a shower. I‚Äôm not a trucker so I can‚Äôt speak of any other services. I only used one shower so I can‚Äôt speak of the others, but mine was clean and stocked with towels and soap. There are 10 showers so I had no wait. The store ‚Ä¶

No star, I try to take shower but no free parking; just park beside the truck making easy access to everyone. The security guard came and shouted at me, we are here for your business, mannerless and so cheap people hired by this TA who even ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I came in @ 3am and noticed there was a wait on the showers. I‚Äôm not surprised . This is a very nice looking location. It‚Äôs still a baby too , as I read it‚Äôs less than 5 years old. Looks fantastic, and glad they are in CT just before MA. I ‚Ä¶

The shower is paid for, even if it's for drivers who earn money, because they fill up. So they should have reconsidered and cleaned the bathroom, not just exhaling the smell and drying it with an old towel. There was hair, cut nails, and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Had a long wait for showers about 2 hours stupid that it only has 3 available and the staff are not on top of cleaning them after use and they were still dirty even after they were supposed to be ready and what the main reason for leaving ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower get something to eat, gas up and sleep after 2 days of traveling,on 8/10/2025 before noon the young lady wearing glasses at the cashier for the showers said 45mins wait, ok great, only 3 showers, so thats ‚Ä¶

This place is just ridiculous, there‚Äôs never any parking and only three showers. I don‚Äôt understand why would they waste they time building this loves if it wasn‚Äôt going to be convenient for the truck drivers. Definitely don‚Äôt mind park at ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is a LEGIT rest stop. Had to use the bathroom with my kids who are ages 5 and 2. The bathrooms were IMPECCABLE,  so incredibly clean.  This place even had a shower for the truckers, laundry room, and a dog park.  Affordable items inside!

‚Ä¶ just trying to exit. If you just need fuel and shower but want more selection and parking and better selection of food you can go back to the TA which has loads more parking including some reserved parking. But be considerate and spend ‚Ä¶

I had a deeply disappointing experience at Love's Travel Stop yesterday. After a long trip, I arrived at the location around 7 p.m., utterly exhausted and in need of a shower. I paid $17 for the shower and waited for 90 minutes, only to ‚Ä¶
I think I dropped my wallet while taking a shower. Please contact me if you happen to find it - all my documents are inside. It was blue in color.üôèüèª ‚Ä¶

Shower at your own risk co drivers... showers get wiped down, doors don't lock, and they give u a 30 min time limit to wash..ü§®...what about couples?!...they do NOT care! They have only 3 shower stalls...will not be staying overnight here at ‚Ä¶
